hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Regime Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC breaks above its 20-day Bollinger Band upper band while the regime is NEUTRAL, and this breakout is accompanied by a 50% increase in 24-hour volume relative to the 7-day average, the regime will transition to BULL within 3 trading days with 70% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes often precede directional moves. Volume-confirmed breakouts from Bollinger Bands in neutral environments signal institutional accumulation and momentum shift before regime models fully adjust. The RSI filter reduces false signals from short squeezes.
entry_conditions: BTC price > 20-day BB upper band (2 std dev)
BTC RSI(14) < 75 (to avoid overbought false breakouts)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime transitions to BULL (confirmed by FjordHQ regime model)
exit_conditions.time_exit: 3 trading days after entry without regime transition

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Less than 60% of signals result in BULL regime transition within 3 days when backtested across 2023-2025 data.
